content: Yeah, I've been looking into those modular systems from Front Runner Outfitters. I think they'd be a great fit for my Toyota 4Runner. Speaking of which, I recently took it on a solo trip to the nearby mountains and tested out my new roof rack system. It performed really well, but I did get stuck in the mud at one point. Thankfully, I was able to get out using my winch and some careful maneuvering.
